title: (x)Sorouh logo - DecoTech {Justin}
content:
Hi all,

Could anyone tell me which font is used for 'Sorouh'?

Many Thanks

S.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sorouh.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515162840/http:/typophile.com/files/sorouh.png) | 15.46 KB |
author: steez

comments.content: It reminds me of Platelet thin mixed with Chalet Comprime (1970 styles) and ITC Anna for the initial S. Well, ... that means: I have no match, just suggestions.
That's a freeware font I made called [DecoTech](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515162840/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10467). It's still out there if you google.
Thanks for the info, wasn't aware of your font.
